item.title: Install
item.description: Configure $PREFIX with the path where you want to install Hue by running: PREFIX=/usr/share make install cd /usr/share/hue You can install Hue anywhere on your system, and run Hue as a non-root user. It is a good practice to create a new user for Hue and either install Hue in that user’s home directory, or in a directory within /usr/share.

item.title: Docker
item.description: Alternatively to building Hue into an image, the Hue Docker Guide is available. It details how to start a Hue in one command line or build a container image with all the dependencies.
